[@microsoft/fast-foundation](./fast-foundation.md) &gt; [focusVisible](./fast-foundation.focusvisible.md)

## focusVisible variable

The string representing the focus selector to be used. Value will be "focus-visible" when https://drafts.csswg.org/selectors-4/\#the-focus-visible-pseudo is supported and "focus" when it is not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
focusVisible: string
```
